::Grounded::
"I think if we asked him truthfully about having his memory chips
erased then he jsut might go for it in his present state...I will go
then and let you talk about it....I will try and find the guns....but
first will do something that could help the ship abit."
Grounded walked out of the room heading for the outside.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Nightlight:
>
> "I don't sure if do that will be  good idea... well I wanna mean, is
> it act bad, do that against his will???? " said Nightlight "What do
> you think Aerotaur?"
>
>
> When Grounded asked about the weapons, Nightlight replied "I don't
> know... we have had severals battles that we haven't had enough time
> to explore all the ship..."
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Grounded::
> > "If what you say is true...that he has amnesia and you are woried if
> > it goes away..I amy be able to help. If you cna convince him and
> allow

> > all that happened before this amnesia came on....but there is a
> chance
> > that i could reawaken the memories while i am at it causing him to

> it.

> > to go do some defense things i promised Windlord i would do when i
> wa
